title: Fishing Planet: Atoll Scout Pack
description:
Take on a 30-day exploration of Noomaa Kuda Atholhu, Maldives, with the Atoll Scout Pack.
You'll be fully equipped with an ultra-powerful bottom spin setup, an extra-long spinning set, and all kinds of baits and lures specially designed to chase exotic ocean species.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Atoll Scout Pack
<!--text-->
Take on a 30-day exploration of Noomaa Kuda Atholhu, Maldives with the Atoll Scout Pack.

You’ll be fully equipped with an ultra-powerful bottom spin setup from Tsurihito™ and an extra-long spinning set from Fletch and Bradford™, plus all kinds of baits and lures specially designed to chase exotic ocean species. A super spacious Tackle Wagon Vault™ accommodates over 400 items so you have everything you need, while extra Marker and Navigation Buoys help you lock onto the best fishing spots. 

Stay cool under the intense tropical sun in the lightweight, breathable SunDrift™ jacket and TropicShade™ hat. TropicLine™ polarized sunglasses cut the glare off the water and add a clean, stylish edge to your outfit. With the License and Premium included, you will make the most XP and money of your adventure in the heart of the Indian Ocean.

Atoll Scout Pack includes:
* 100000 CREDITS
* 50 BAITCOINS
* 30-DAYS PREMIUM
* 20 Marker Buoys
* 100 Slots
* 2 Tackle Setup Slots
* 5 Navigational Buoys


RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* Fletch and Bradford™ BreakwaterX 8' 10"(270) SE - Length: 8' 10" (2.7 m); Lure Weight: 5/8–5 7/16 Oz (18–154 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 66–170 Lb (30–77 kg); Action: Fast
* Tsurihito™ KarasuTōha 6' 3"(190) SE - Length: 6' 3" (1.9 m); Casting Weight: 7–37 Oz (200–1050 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 154–220 Lb (70–100 kg); Action: Moderate

Reels:
* Tsurihito™ Tengu Kai 18000 SE - Ratio: 7.5; Recovery: 47.2" (120 cm); Capacity: Mono 132/370 (1.00/370), Braid 104/900 (0.42/900); Max Drag: 215 Lb (97.5 kg); Drag: Front
* Fletch and Bradford™ XCurrent 10000 SE - Ratio: 7.5; Recovery: 49.2" (125 cm); Capacity: Mono 99/315 (0.85/315), Braid 77/770 (0.35/770); Max Drag: 165 Lb (75 kg); Drag: Front


TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length: 2500 yd (2500 m):
ZenLine Braid .02" (0.50 mm) - Test: 212 Lb ( 96 kg)
Kaigen Fluoro .0393" (1.0 mm) - Test: 165 Lb (75 kg)
OceanPower Mono .0374" (0.95 mm) - Test: 121 Lb (55 kg)
CrystalPower Mono .0433" (1.1 mm) - Test: 194 Lb (88 kg)

* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .0393 (1.0) (x15) - Length: 3' 3" (1 m); Test: 121 Lb (55 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .0393 (1.0) (x15) - Length: 4' 11" (1.5 m); Test: 121 Lb (55 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .0472 (1.2) (x15) - Length: 3' 3" (1 m); Test: 165 Lb (75 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .0472 (1.2) (x15) - Length: 4' 11" (1.5 m); Test: 165 Lb (75 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .0551 (1.4) (x15) - Length: 3' 3" (1 m); Test: 212 Lb (96 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .0551 (1.4) (x15) - Length: 4' 11" (1.5 m); Test: 212 Lb (96 kg)
* TitanGuard Titanium Leader .0197 (0.50) (x15) - Length: 3' 28" (1 m); Test: 157 Lb (71 kg)
* TitanGuard Titanium Leader .0197 (0.50) (x15) - Length: 1' 64" (0.5 m); Test: 157 Lb (71 kg)
* TitanGuard Titanium Leader .0205 (0.52) (x15) - Length: 3' 28" (1 m); Test: 187 Lb (85 kg)
* TitanGuard Titanium Leader .0205 (0.52) (x15) - Length: 1' 64" (0.5 m); Test: 187 Lb (85 kg)

* Kaku Tsuribari Hooks: #1/0 (x9), #2/0 (x9), #4/0 (x9), #6/0 (x9), #12/0 (x9), #14/0 (x9), #16/0 (x9), #18/0 (x9), #20/0 (x9)
* Saltwater Curved Hooks: #8/0 (x9), #9/0 (x9), #10/0 (x9)
* Cannonball Sinkers: 7 Oz (200 g) (x3), 8 Oz (225 g) (x3), 10 Oz (275 g) (x3)
* Snapper Sinkers: 9 Oz (250 g) (x3), 12 1/3 Oz (350 g) (x3), 16 Oz (450 g) (x3)
* Storm Sinkers: 10 1/2 Oz (300 g) (x3), 14 Oz (400 g) (x3), 18 Oz (500 g) (x3), 21 Oz (600 g) (x3)
* Bucktails: 1/2 Oz (14 g), #3/0 (x6); 3/4 Oz (21 g), #4/0 (x6); 1 3/4 Oz (35 g), #6/0 (x6)
* Giant Poppers: 3 1/6 Oz (90 g), #5/0 (x3); 3 7/8 Oz (110 g), #6/0 (x3); 4 9/16 Oz (130 g), #7/0 (x3)
* Saltwater Spoons: 3 1/6 Oz (90 g), #5/0 (x27); 4 1/4 Oz (120 g), #7/0 (x27); 5 3/10 Oz (150 g), #9/0 (x27)
* Saltwater Baits: Clam Meat (x50), Filamentous Red Algae (x50), Fish Head (x50), Giant Tiger Prawn (x50), Gulf Shrimp (x50), Gutted Fish (x50), Indo-Pacific Swimming Crab (x50), Large Fish Strips (x50), Medium Fish Strips (x50), Mussel Meat (x50), Natal Rock Oyster Meat (x50)


EQUIPMENT
* Tsurihito™ LagoonShell™ Rod Case - Rods: 3; Reels: 4; Lines: 3
* Tsurihito™ SunDrift™ Angler Jacket - Tackles: 25; Lines: 2
* UL-CHUBER Tackle Wagon Vault™ - Tackles: 420; Lines: 50; Groundbait Components: 150
* Tsurihito™ TropicLine™ Glasses - Color: Yellow
* Tsurihito™ TropicShade™ Fishing Cap - Tackles: 3; Flashlight: No; Flashlight Slot: Yes
* RIVERTEX AquaRay™ Headlamp - Lighting Range: 50 yd (50 m); Lighting Spot Angle: 3 ft (1.5 m); Lighting Tone: Yellow


FISHING LICENSES (30 days):
* Advanced Maldives License


POND PASSES (30 days):
* NOOMAA KUDA ATHOLHU
